attributes.comment:
In reference to DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044, I wholeheartedly oppose the
fee increases. Why do you want to make it any harder and more expensive for
families to adopt orphans that need loving homes? The cost of adoption is already
astronomical, why do you want to make it worse? I do not mind paying taxes and
fees when the results are beneficial to our communities and country, and when
the money is being used effeciently and effectively. Having personal experience
with the USCIS, the paperwork, and the fees associated with this proposal, these
fee increases meet none of those criteria, with the possible exception of the
biometric fees. I can understand how the increase there would be needed.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Renee E. Moorman
